summary: This appears to be an email header regarding a discovery letter related to MCC (Metropolitan Correctional Center), sent on October 13, 2020. The document is minimal, containing only metadata and no substantive body text to analyze for persons, events, or facts.
keyFacts: The document is an email header dated October 13, 2020, concerning an 'MCC discovery letter'.
MCC refers to the Metropolitan Correctional Center, the federal jail where Jeffrey Epstein died.
The email subject suggests correspondence related to legal discovery in a case connected to the MCC.
No substantive message body or named individuals are present in the provided text.
The embedded file 'MCC discovety_letter.msg' indicates the primary content was an attachment not included here.
